alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:13PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CUSTER...SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON AND EAST CENTRAL WESTON COUNTIES... At 1013 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Moon, or 9 miles northeast of Newcastle, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bear Mountain Lookout, Medicine Mountain, Jewel Cave National Monument, Crazy Horse Memorial, Custer, northwestern Custer State Park, Sylvan Lake and Stockade Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
